titles.title: PHA Public Health Flexible Funding Act of 2020
To provide for the use of Public Housing Operating and Capital Fund amounts to address public health emergencies, and for other purposes.
PHA Public Health Flexible Funding Act of 2020

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary:
PHA Public Health Flexible Funding Act of 2020
This bill allows public housing agencies to use certain federal funding to carry out certain operation and management activities that are designed to prevent or address the spread of infectious diseases, including COVID-19 (i.e., coronavirus disease 2019).
